text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia glaphyra is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell grows to a length of 2.5 mm
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off St Helena
